message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $110. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $90 is a tempting offer, I believe the true value of this product is higher. I'm willing to come down to $100, which I feel is a fair compromise.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go up to $100. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $95. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
